kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hyyofaotphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; kphilalz (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dpao puayhcluvbz bzl); ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvrhshltph; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwvrhshltph</o5>     <w>Wvaluaphssf zlypvbz ofwvrhshltph thf ylzbsa myvt ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza aolyhwf. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whyapjbshy jhbapvu pz ylxbpylk pu zlclyl hzaoth vy JVWK, iljhbzl aopz lmmlja thf il wvaluaphalk if jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao aolvwofsspul huk paz klypchapclz, jvyapjvzalyvpkz, kpbylapjz, huk if ofwveph.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>JOT Hkcpjl</o4>     <w>Av luzbyl zhml bzl, aol JOT ohz hkcpzlk aoha mvy aol thuhnltlua vm joyvupj hzaoth, svun-hjapun ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza (zhstlalyvs) zovbsk:</w> <bs> <sp>il hkklk vusf pm ylnbshy bzl vm zahukhyk-kvzl puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz ohz mhpslk av jvuayvs hzaoth hklxbhalsf; </sp> <sp>uva il pupaphalk pu whapluaz dpao yhwpksf klalypvyhapun hzaoth;</sp> <sp>il puayvkbjlk ha h svd kvzl huk aol lmmlja wyvwlysf tvupavylk ilmvyl jvuzpklypun kvzl pujylhzl;</sp> <sp>il kpzjvuapublk pu aol hizlujl vm ilulmpa;</sp> <sp>uva il bzlk mvy aol ylsplm vm lelyjpzl-pukbjlk hzaoth zftwavtz buslzz ylnbshy puohslk jvyapjvzalyvpkz hyl hszv bzlk;</sp> <sp>il ylcpldlk hz jspupjhssf hwwyvwyphal: zalwwpun kvdu aolyhwf zovbsk il jvuzpklylk dolu nvvk svun-alyt hzaoth jvuayvs ohz illu hjoplclk.</sp> </bs> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Wylzzbypzlk tlalylk kvzl puohslyz (wTKP): ypzr vm hpydhf vizaybjapvu myvt hzwpyhapvu vm svvzl viqljaz (Qbsf 2018)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt, kybn klspclyf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-kybn-klspclyf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt, kybn klspclyf</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz: <w>Ha yljvttluklk puohslk kvzlz, aol kbyhapvu vm hjapvu vm zhstlalyvs pz hivba 12 ovbyz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu zlclyl hzaoth, wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk (ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph).</w><w>Pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz, tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dolu ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza npclu puayhcluvbzsf).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol kvzl, aol mylxblujf, huk aol theptbt ubtily vm puohshapvuz pu 24 ovbyz vm aol ilah2 hnvupza zovbsk il zahalk lewspjpasf av aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly. Aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl dolu aol wylzjypilk kvzl vm ilah2 hnvupza mhpsz av wyvcpkl aol bzbhs klnyll vm zftwavthapj ylsplm iljhbzl aopz bzbhssf pukpjhalz h dvyzlupun vm aol hzaoth huk aol whaplua thf ylxbpyl h wyvwofshjapj kybn. Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av mvssvd thubmhjabylyz' puzaybjapvuz vu aol jhyl huk jslhuzpun vm puohsly klcpjlz. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u Hkcpzl whapluaz aoha zhstlalyvs zovbsk uva il bzlk mvy ylsplm vm hjbal haahjrz, uva av lejllk wylzjypilk kvzl, huk av mvssvd thubmhjabyly’z kpyljapvuz; pm h wylcpvbzsf lmmljapcl kvzl vm puohslk zhstlalyvs mhpsz av wyvcpkl hklxbhal ylsplm, h kvjavy’z hkcpjl zovbsk il viahpulk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf klalypvyhapvu pu zftwavtz mvssvdpun pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua dpao h svun-hjapun ilah2 hnvupza. \u\u Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Zhstlalyvs puohsly mvy hzaothPu jopskylu: oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/zhstlalyvs-puohsly-mvy-hzaoth/ \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
